'''Go With the Wind!''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Elemental Specialist]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to trigger {{Cryo}}, {{Hydro}}, {{Pyro}} and {{Electro}} [[Swirl]] Reactions at least once each within two seconds (one time).
